name: Enraged Troop
description:
ENRAGED TROOP - 3D

GAME INSTRUCTIONS : 

Find the two keys (Silver and Gold) & Reach the gate to win

COLLECTABLES : 

Keys 

M4a1 & Pistol

Grenades

Health Kit

CONTROLS : 

W,A,S,D - Movements

F - Pickup Objects

R - Reload

Q - Grenade

LSHIFT - Sprint

SPACE - Jump

INSTALLATION STEPS : 

Run the setup file

Choose directory & install the game

Run the game
